Translations.Text: and Our command is not but one as the twinkling of the eye
And, certainly, We caused to perish their partisans. Is there, then, one who recalls
And everything they accomplished is in the ancient scrolls
And every small and great thing is that which is written
Truly, the ones who are Godfearing will be in Gardens and rivers
in positions of sincerity near an Omnipotent King
The Merciful
He taught the Quran
He created the human being
He taught him the clear explanation
The sun and the moon are to keep count
And the stars and the trees both prostrate
And the heaven He exalted. And He set in place the Balance
that you be not defiant in the Balance
Set up the weighing with justice and skimp not in the Balance
And He set the earth in place for the human race
On and in it are many kinds of sweet fruit and date palm trees with sheathed fruit trees
and grain possessor of husks and fragrant herbs
So which of the benefits of the Lord of you both will you both deny
